alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 31 at 4:59AM ChST until February 06 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE AS DRY CONDITIONS BUILD FURTHER... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND HIGH WIND FOR GUAM... The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Guam, especially the central and southern mountains. * WIND...Northeast to east winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...55 to 60 percent in the afternoons. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
